data.name: White Mirror
data.detailed_description:
White Mirror is a hardcore 2D platformer with a twist, intended for speedrunners. In this double-sided platformer, run, jump and bounce on walls in order to avoid traps and make your way to the end of the level.

Players will be able to see an environment and its reflection, which is a perfect inversion of the other one.
Platforms, traps and enemies in white only appear on the black background and the other way around, black ones only appear on the white background.

However, they exist in both sides.

Players must combine both information to see the world how it really is.
data.about_the_game:
White Mirror is a hardcore 2D platformer with a twist, intended for speedrunners. In this double-sided platformer, run, jump and bounce on walls in order to avoid traps and make your way to the end of the level.

Players will be able to see an environment and its reflection, which is a perfect inversion of the other one.
Platforms, traps and enemies in white only appear on the black background and the other way around, black ones only appear on the white background.

However, they exist in both sides.

Players must combine both information to see the world how it really is.
data.short_description: A hardcore platformer, intended for speedrunners to try to beat as fast as possible !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) m3-8100Y CPU @1.10GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 615 or equivalent
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: Runs on almost any computer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) m3-8100Y CPU @1.10GHz or superior
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce GTX 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: Runs on almost any computer

  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) m3-8100Y CPU @1.10GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 615 or equivalent
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: Runs on almost any computer
